PluginViewModel.Name: PLCopenXML-Viewer
PluginViewModel.Author: AutomationML e.V. (Adaption to AutomationML Editor Plugin: Josef Prinz)
PluginViewModel.Description: The PLCopenXML-Viewer is an AutomationML Editor plugin, which allows you to display the content of PLCOpenXML-documents, which are referenced from AutomationML objects.
